Risk_Description: Unauthorized access due to shared accounts or weak MFA adoption
Mitigation: Enforce MFA for all users and remove shared accounts

Risk_Description: Excessive shared drive permissions (permission creep) without periodic reviews
Mitigation: Quarterly access reviews + owner assignment per drive

Risk_Description: Sensitive files exposed via overly permissive link sharing (public links)
Mitigation: Restrict external sharing; train staff; audit sharing settings

Risk_Description: Loss or theft of event loaner laptops leading to data exposure
Mitigation: Disk encryption + device tracking + sign-out log

Risk_Description: Use of unencrypted personal USB drives for org data
Mitigation: Ban unapproved drives; provide encrypted drives + logging

Risk_Description: Admin privileges too broad (too many admins)
Mitigation: Limit admin roles; implement role-based admin; review quarterly

Risk_Description: Weak Wi-Fi security allowing unauthorized network access
Mitigation: Use strong WPA2/WPA3 password + rotate; guest network separation

Risk_Description: Missing/incorrect asset inventory reduces accountability and incident response
Mitigation: Run quarterly inventory audit; custody owners; discrepancy tracking
